Description: SCOM or AIB register access to non-existent register address. Address did not match any register sets within the ETU_RSB macro.
ETU/Fundamental A Registers: SCOM or AIB register access to non-existent register address.

Field Mnemonic: Fundamental A PCI CFG Addr/Size Error
Description: ETU/Fundamental A Registers: SCOM or AIB, PCI CFG_DATA access addr+size crossed a 4-byte boundary.

Field Mnemonic: Fundamental A IODA Table Access Error
Description: ETU/Fundamental A Registers: SCOM or AIB, IODA table access to unused/reserved table select in the table address register.

Field Mnemonic: Fundamental A Internal Registers Parity Error
Description: ETU/Fundamental A Registers: Internal parity error detected in the registers.

Description: ETU/Error Registers: SCOM or AIB register access to non-existent register address.

Description: ETU/Fundamental B Registers: Internal parity error detected in the registers.
